overview: Tennessee outsider artist Billy Tripp has constructed a massive steel sculpture for the past 33 years, and is finally setting his sights on retirement. Former Brownsville native Randall Kendrick examines Trippâ€™s life and work as he builds one of the final pieces of his ever expanding sculpture, The Mindfield.
tagline: A Cathedral. A Ship. A Life... Forged in Steel.
title: The Steel Garden
